Package Board

package Board
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    BoardBuilder
    Board Builder interface
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Abstract class, stores data about board - fields and players positions
    BoardField
    A single field of a board, it stores information about its color, status and position
    BoardShapes
    A data class that stores possible board shapes in form of int[][] arrays.
    DefaultBoard
    The game board stores data about the fields and players positions
    DefaultBoardBuilder
    Builds board based on one of int[][] arrays that are stored in BoardShapes
    DefaultStartFields
    Stores references to start fields.
    JSONBoardConverter
    Converts a board to a JSON String which can be sent to clients by the server.
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    PlayerColor
    Enum with possible player colors
    StatusColor
    Enum with possible status colors
